## Utils.getLocalModuleName() method

Gets the `local module` name from the `path`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getLocalModuleName(path: string): string | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | string | The <code>path</code> we get <code>local module</code> name from |

<b>Returns:</b>

string \| null

the `local module` name of the `path` or null if there isn't a corresponding `module`
